lead_paragraph: Gallup found that flexible scheduling and work-from-home opportunities play a major role in an employee’s decision to take or leave a job.
snippet: Gallup found that flexible scheduling and work-from-home opportunities play a major role in an employee’s decision to take or leave a job....

headline.main: Out of the Office: More People Are Working Remotely, Survey Finds
headline.print_headline: More Are on the Job While Out of the Office
